relation: Contemporary issues relating to curriculum literacies and the relationship between literacies and learning.

Frameworks and pedagogies for embedding the teaching and learning of literacies into planning for content area learning, e.g. multiliteracies pedagogies, knowledge processes, four resources model, ERICA model, auditing tools.
Repertoires of learning/teaching strategies for curriculum literacies; Catering for diverse learners (e.g. ESL); Working from learners' strengths and ensuring equitable learning outcomes.
Unit planning for effective content learning and literacy learning in key learning areas, including considerations relating to text and resource selection.
Focused learning/teaching episodes to cater for diverse learners
